content:
*   What did we do well?
    *   We separated the development into front-end and back-end so it would be easier to assign the mission to members.
    *   We spent time on understanding the existing code base. This helps us to develop easier. We had scheduled multiple meetings with the sponsor to understand the requirements. This helped us a lot in getting to know the website they already had.
*   What should we continue doing?
    *   Keep in touch with the sponsor.
    *   Learning React JS and Firebase.
*   How can we improve?
    *   Improve clarity of all user stories and tasks during the sprint meeting. Spending more time during the sprint planning would reduce our time in understanding the tasks during the sprint. We need to communicate more often than what we did so everyone is aware of their tasks.
    *   We failed to record the previous sprint meetings. We will be recording all meetings from now on to make sure nobody misses important details.
content_html:

  • What should we continue doing?
    • Keep in touch with the sponsor.
    • Learning React JS and Firebase.
  • How can we improve?
    • Improve clarity of all user stories and tasks during the sprint meeting. Spending more time during the sprint planning would reduce our time in understanding the tasks during the sprint. We need to communicate more often than what we did so everyone is aware of their tasks.
    • We failed to record the previous sprint meetings. We will be recording all meetings from now on to make sure nobody misses important details.

content:
In the first sprint, we've made a good foundation for this project. We discuss to confirm the requirement. The most challenging part for this sprint is to understand the existing code base and building the local environment for development. 

**Does the system contribute to the overall objective of the organization?**

Yes, It will develop a way to the software that will have functionality.

**Can the system be implemented within the schedule and budget using current technology?**

Yes, it can be implemented within the schedule and budget using current technology.

**Can the system be integrated with other systems that are used?**

Yes, we have front-end and backend which can connect local and production server.

project.name: SBS-Bieganski
project.description: This project involves improving the Scrum board simulator application by the way of utilizing Agile methods.

content_diff:
* What did we do well?
* We separated the development into front-end and back-end so it would be easier to assign the mission to members.
* We spent time on understanding the existing code base. This helps us to develop easier. We had scheduled multiple meetings with the sponsor to understand the requirements. This helped us a lot in getting to know the website they already had.
* What should we continue doing?
* Keep in touch with the sponsor.
* Learning React JS and Firebase.
* How can we improve?
* Improve clarity of all user stories and tasks during the sprint meeting. Spending more time during the sprint planning would reduce our time in understanding the tasks during the sprint. We need to communicate more often than what we did so everyone is aware of their tasks.
* We failed to record the previous sprint meetings. We will be recording all meetings from now on to make sure nobody misses important details.
* What should we continue doing?

* How can we improve?
content_html:
• What did we do well?
    • We separated the development into front-end and back-end so it would be easier to assign the mission to members.
    • We spent time on understanding the existing code base. This helps us to develop easier. We had scheduled multiple meetings with the sponsor to understand the requirements. This helped us a lot in getting to know the website they already had.
  • What should we continue doing?
    • Keep in touch with the sponsor.
    • Learning React JS and Firebase.
  • How can we improve?
    • Improve clarity of all user stories and tasks during the sprint meeting. Spending more time during the sprint planning would reduce our time in understanding the tasks during the sprint. We need to communicate more often than what we did so everyone is aware of their tasks.
    • We failed to record the previous sprint meetings. We will be recording all meetings from now on to make sure nobody misses important details.

• What did we do well?

  • What should we continue doing?

  • How can we improve?

content_html:
• What did we do well?
    • We separated the development into front-end and back-end so it would be easier to assign the mission to members.

project.name: SBS-Bieganski
project.description: This project involves improving the Scrum board simulator application by the way of utilizing Agile methods.

content_diff:
In the first sprint, we've made a good foundation for this project. We discuss to confirm the requirement. The most challenging part for this sprint is to understand the existing code base and building the local environment for development. 

**Does the system contribute to the overall objective of the organization?**

Yes, It will develop a way to the software that will have functionality.

**Can the system be implemented within the schedule and budget using current technology?**

Yes, it can be implemented within the schedule and budget using current technology.

**Can the system be integrated with other systems that are used?**

Yes, we have front-end and backend which can connect local and production server.
content_html:
In the first sprint, we've made a good foundation for this project. We discuss to confirm the requirement. The most challenging part for this sprint is to understand the existing code base and building the local environment for development. 

Does the system contribute to the overall objective of the organization?

Yes, It will develop a way to the software that will have functionality.

Can the system be implemented within the schedule and budget using current technology?

Yes, it can be implemented within the schedule and budget using current technology.

Can the system be integrated with other systems that are used?

Yes, we have front-end and backend which can connect local and production server.
